long_description: Stretchy and moisture wicking, the women's prAna Deena Pants will be your new faves for the yoga studio or for early morning runs. Performance French-terry fabric offers 4-way stretch with ergonomic seams that conform to your body. Mesh insets aid in ventilation. Silicone gripper at inside hem keeps legs in place. Reflective zippers at lower back legs ease tights on or off over your shoes. prAna Deena Pants feature a small zippered rear pocket for a house key or energy gel. Gusset adds comfort. Closeout.
short_description: Stretchy and moisture wicking, the women's prAna Deena Pants will be your new faves for the yoga studio or for early morning runs.
